channel.title: Many questions
channel.description:
i have many questions so im just going to list them:
1. how do i make a personal server and give it a name(example: cheezescape)? 2. how do i set objects? 3. how do i give the NPCs that you spawn health? 4. how do i make crystal bows shoot and not hit the NPC up close? 5. how do i name a shop? 6. how do i put stuff into a shop and give it a price? 7. how do i make it so that you dont have to use runes or have a sertin level to use spells? 8. how do i make a help thing? [b][u]AND LAST BUT SERTINALY LEAST. [/u] [/b] how do i make custom commands(example: ::dragon gives you fill dragon)? and one more thing. how do i add tuts to my server?
I hope people can help anwser these questions!
[center]Thanx in advance![/center]

item.title: Many questions
item.dc:creator: @1m_3m0 1m 3m0
item.description:
@1m_3m0 wrote:

lots of questions but theres lots of tuts on how to do that stuff in the tut section

Read full topic

item.title: Many questions
item.dc:creator: @sato sato
item.description:
@sato wrote:

i have many questions so im just going to list them:

  1. how do i make a personal server and give it a name(example: cheezescape)?
  2. how do i set objects?
  3. how do i give the NPCs that you spawn health?
  4. how do i make crystal bows shoot and not hit the NPC up close?
  5. how do i name a shop?
  6. how do i put stuff into a shop and give it a price?
  7. how do i make it so that you dont have to use runes or have a sertin level to use spells?
  8. how do i make a help thing?
    AND LAST BUT SERTINALY LEAST. how do i make custom commands(example: ::dragon gives you fill dragon)?
    and one more thing. how do i add tuts to my server?

I hope people can help anwser these questions!

[center]Thanx in advance![/center]

Read full topic
